data.name: The Machines Arena
data.detailed_description:
The Machines Arena is an adrenaline fueled PvP game where 9 unique heroes battle competitively in teams of 4v4 for some pulse-pounding mayhem, delivered in a top-down perspective. Pick a hero that suits your personality, style, and killer instinct, and dive right into the action!

The game is currently in Closed Beta - you can sign up for it through our website.



  • Matches are 5-7 minutes—the perfect game length to own or get owned.
  • No rest for the wicked! Fast respawns for swift revenge amid stunning visuals
  • Competitive rank mode—duke it out to become the ultimate champion.
  • Controls to match your style—twin joysticks, controller, mouse and keyboard.



  • Specialized abilities and weapons mean each hero has its own distinct playstyle.
  • Favorite and familiar classes—all here and ready for you to get some!



  • There are multiple game modes and maps—no triumphant victory or crushing defeat is ever the same!
  • Join the action with friends, link up with a team, or have some solo fun.
  • Hone your lethal skills! Dominate the training room bots before bringing your A-game to the Machines Arena for real hero-on-hero action.



  • The game features a level playing field for all players, with every hero available right from the start.

data.short_description: The Machines Arena is an adrenaline-fueled 4v4 PvP game where players battle competitively. Players engage in pulse-pounding combat mayhem, delivered from a top-down perspective. The extremely precise and smooth gameplay cannot be described in words, it needs to be experienced!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These specs are preliminary and may change before release

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
